name: Stenmonster
description:
Some known issues:
* The game takes ~1min to load
* When the game starts - move with WASD to get your character to load
* When you die - reload the page to get the items to spawn again :)

E - to pick up items (the chest and the red boxes that don't have any sprite)
Q - to use that special ability... (the blue box...)
Space bar + Arrow keys - to move the teleport marker and move short distances in an instant

WASD - to move
Arrow keys - shoot your main weapon

~ Thanks for playing! This is a game made by a couple of friends for our first game jam ever in 2018! ~

Music & Sound:
Heimer Ahnfelt [https://soundcloud.com/heimer-ahnfelt]
Gustan Arneback [https://soundcloud.com/garneback]

Programming:
Agge [https://augustalex.itch.io/]
David Jensen

Art:
Gabriel Björk Stiernström [https://gabrielbjorkstiernstrom.com/]
